item.title: Pages
item.description: .. ├── blog/ │ ├── say-hello-to-doks/ │ │ ├── index.md │ │ └── say-hello-to-doks.png │ └── _index.md ├── about/ │ └── index.md ├── contributors/ │ ├── henk-verlinde/ │ │ └── _index.md │ └── _index.md ├── docs/ │ ├── help/ │ │ ├── _index.md │ │ └── faq.md │ ├── overview/ │ │ ├── _index.md │ │ ├── commands.md │ │ └── introduction.md │ └── _index.md └── _index.md See also the Hugo docs: Content Organization.

item.title: Menus
item.description: See also the Hugo docs: Menus. ./config/_default/menus/menus.en.toml Global navigation Add to main menu [[main]] name = "Docs" url = "/docs/overview/introduction/" # url = "/docs/1.0/overview/introduction/" weight = 10 [[main]] name = "Blog" url = "/blog/" weight = 20 [[main]] name = "Get Started" weight = 30 identifier = "get-started" url = "/docs/overview/introduction/" [[main]] name = "Quick Start" weight = 40 identifier = "quick-start" url = "/docs/overview/quick-start/" parent = "get-started" [[main]] name = "Tutorial" weight = 50 identifier = "tutorial" url = "https://getdoks.
